comments: nice guy with good sense of humor, take home quizzes were awesome but had a hard time learning with his teaching style, I had heard that he was very willing to help outside of class but never asked cuz whenever someone asked a question in class he seemed to take it as a personal attack against him He\'s a tough grader but generous with xtra points

Tom\'s a fantastic teacher. Has a good sense of humor, ALWAYS willing to help you. Fair grader, tests are reasonable. Is a knowledgeable instructor and is flexible with his students as long as you aren\'t a screw off!!!

He\'s actually a pretty good teacher and a really nice guy. He\'s always willing to spend extra time helping students understand the material. If you disrupt his class by laughing, talking to classmates or sleeping he\'ll yell at you but if you pay attention and do homework he\'ll set you up for success.

This professor is willing to help you if you give him the chance. He has a good spirit. Maybe he is a little tough on grading, but that is the way math is. Your either wrong or your right and he at least gives you a fighting chance.
Really hard grader, thinks he should be teaching at a university or something. Just a slight mishape on graphs he marks it wrong.
Be prepared to be yelled at like you are 12 years old. He\'s very condescending and treats people like they are idiots.
